field.name: useCols
field.label: Show links as columns?
field.description: Any search option that you have defined as link type (where pertinent) will be shown as columns (IE br put on the end of the link)

field.name: geosearchtype
field.label: Search by town/region/country only
field.description: Show the search by town/region/country input

field.name: geosearch_dropdown
field.label: Show as dropdown?
field.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

field.name: selectcombo
field.label: Search region by select combo dropdown
field.description: Offer a search dropdown to filter through countries/regions/towns

field.name: propertyname
field.label: Search by property name
field.description: Show the search by property name input

field.name: propertyname_dropdown
field.label: Show as dropdown?
field.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

field.name: ptype
field.label: Search by property type
field.description: Show the search by property type input

field.name: ptype_dropdown
field.label: Show as dropdown?
field.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

field.name: room_type
field.label: Search by room type
field.description: Show the search by room type input

field.name: room_type_dropdown
field.label: Show as dropdown?
field.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

field.name: features
field.label: Search by features
field.description: Show the search by feature input

field.name: features_dropdown
field.label: Show as dropdown?
field.description: Set this to no to show the list as images and checkboxes

field.name: featurecols
field.label: Feature columns
field.description: The number of feature icons that can be shown before a br is inserted to go to next row.

field.name: description
field.label: Search bydescription
field.description: Show the search by description input

field.name: availability
field.label: Search by availability
field.description: Show the search by availability input

field.name: priceranges
field.label: Search by price ranges
field.description: Show the search by price ranges input

field.name: pricerange_increments
field.label: Price range increments
field.description: Jomres will look at all the values in the tariffs then work out a series of price ranges based on the increments value you set here.

field.name: guestnumber
field.label: Search by guest numbers
field.description: This will allow users to search for properties that have specific tariffs for specific guest numbers.

field.name: stars
field.label: Search by stars
field.description: Show the search by star input. Note that this is not the number of review stars, it is the star rating, eg. AA 4 stars.
